content: Hello Abhigna! It's nice to meet you. How can I assist you today?
I can understand what you're saying, but I don't have the ability to hear in the classical sense since I'm a text-based AI chatbot. I can only read and respond to text inputs.
No, I'm a text-based AI chatbot, I don't have the capability to generate images.
No, I can't generate images. I'm a text-based AI and can only process and respond with text.
